structure.unit: ARTICLE LXXVIII. COMMISSION ON ETHICS AND PUBLIC TRUST

text.section:
Sec. 2-1068. Jurisdiction.
The jurisdiction of the Ethics Commission shall extend to any person required to comply with the County or municipal Code of Ethics Ordinances, Conflict of Interest Ordinances, Lobbyist Registration and Reporting Ordinances, Ethical Campaign Practices Ordinances or Citizens' Bill of Rights.
